mapper.select: SELECT REMAIN_VACATION, MEMBER_CODE, VACATION_NO FROM TBL_VACATION WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } ORDER BY VACATION_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(IF(IS_HALF_DAY, 0.5, DATEDIFF(VACATION_END_DATE, VACATION_START_DATE) - (FLOOR((DATEDIFF(VACATION_END_DATE, VACATION_START_DATE) + WEEKDAY(VACATION_START_DATE) + 1) / 7) * 2) - (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(VACATION_START_DATE) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(VACATION_END_DATE) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + 1)) AS usedDay FROM TBL_USED_VACATION A JOIN TBL_VACATION B ON A.VACATION_NO = B.VACATION_NO WHERE B.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_VACATION (VACATION_NO, MEMBER_CODE) values (null, #{ memberCode })

insert into TBL_USED_VACATION (VACATION_NO, MEMBER_CODE, VACATION_START_DATE, VACATION_END_DATE, IS_HALF_DAY) values (#{ vacationNo },#{memberCode}, #{ vacationStartDate }, #{ vacationEndDate }, #{ isHalfDay })
